unnormalised: Good news for aspiring engineers! JEE Main 2025 registrations are now open till 30/11/2024. Don't miss the chance to apply for IITs, NITs, and other top engineering colleges. Exam dates are tentatively set for Jan 2025, but keep checking the NTA website nta.ac.in for the official schedule. Last year, cutoff for general category at IIT Bombay was around rank 500!
normalised: Good news for aspiring engineers! J-E-E Main two thousand twenty five registrations are now open till thirtieth november two thousand twenty four. Don't miss the chance to apply for I-I-T-s, N-I-T-s, and other top engineering colleges. Exam dates are tentatively set for January two thousand twenty five, but keep checking the N-T-A website N-T-A dot A-C dot I-N for the official schedule. Last year, cutoff for general category at I-I-T Bombay was around rank five hundred!

unnormalised: Heads up! Many students are facing issues uploading their documents. Make sure your file size is less than 200 KB. Also, your class 10th and 12th marksheets should be readily available. Pro tip: If you are applying under a reserved category, like OBC or SC/ST, keep your certificates handy. Check the official brochure for detailed instructions.
normalised: Heads up! Many students are facing issues uploading their documents. Make sure your file size is less than two hundred K-B. Also, your class tenth and twelfth marksheets should be readily available. Pro tip: If you are applying under a reserved category, like O-B-C or S-C slash S-T, keep your certificates handy. Check the official brochure for detailed instructions.

unnormalised: For those aiming for Delhi University (DU) PG admissions, the application deadline is 15th June 2024. Seats are filling up fast for courses like M.Com and MA English. The entrance exam is expected to be tougher than last year so prep well!
normalised: For those aiming for Delhi University (D-U) P-G admissions, the application deadline is fifteenth June two thousand twenty four. Seats are filling up fast for courses like M dot Com and M-A English. The entrance exam is expected to be tougher than last year so prep well!

unnormalised: Remember to carefully fill out all the details, including your address and contact number. Any discrepancies can lead to rejection. All the best to everyone applying!
normalised: Remember to carefully fill out all the details, including your address and contact number. Any discrepancies can lead to rejection. All the best to everyone applying!
